body.p: In November 2008 the International Accounting Standards Board issued IFRIC 17 Distributions of Non-cash Assets to Owners. It was developed by the Interpretations Committee.

variants.p: The Basis for Conclusions on IFRIC 17 was amended to reflect IFRS 9 Financial Instruments (issued July 2014).

Other Standards have made minor consequential amendments to IFRIC 17. They include IFRS 10 Consolidated Financial Statements (issued May 2011), IFRS 13 Fair Value Measurement (issued May 2011) and Amendments to References to the Conceptual Framework in IFRS Standards (issued March 2018).
